reviewText: Ground fighting is a good basic video for the beginner and review for us old guys that no longer wrestle.
I was very happy with this purchase. The material was clearly presented and the techniques were explained in detail.

Sick of your BJJ buddies besting you in grappling matches? Check out this video! Sammy teaches you the basics of what to do when a fight goes to the ground. I especially enjoyed the discussion of fighting on concrete verses a mat. This DVD advertises as teaching "The Basics", but even the experienced ground guy will learn from it. I definitely recommend this.
